vsParam:
Hey, you! You are violating the school rules!
No running in the hallway!

Why would you answer him...
You were flying and not running, the rule doesn't apply to you.

Oh, oh my...
I am startled by such a sudden and loud voice...

... Uh? Ah, hey, [px] and you guys.
What's wrong?

Nothing's wrong... But Cresson, Aren't guards responsible
for the security of the Academy?

Why do you ask that... Of course.
To be good at my job, I must exercise frequently.

So... Is rectifying violators of school rules a part of your job?
How come I feel that you are more hard-working on it?
Is that really a guard's job?

Er, of course it is! Maintaining the school discipline
is an important part of my job!

Okay, then. I thought you gave yourself the power
to rectify the rule-breakers.

Hmm, I am a member of the "Academy Guard"!
My actions and contributions must be worthy of this title!

Maintaining the school discipline is an important part! Hence,
rectifying rule-breakers is an important of my job, too!

Oh... But, I think it's no big deal to run in the hallway, huh?
Maybe the student is hurry to do something.
No need to be so strict on such petty things.

No, this is just wrong. You may think it as a petty thing...
But the weak awareness may lead to more serious violations.

And eventually harm
everyone in the Academy.

So, all violations, no matter how small, must be treated
seriously. And that's for the sake of everyone in the Academy!

Ah, er... Cresson, you are really upright.
But your uprightness makes me feel overwhelmed...

Huh? What is it, Peppermint.
I beg your pardon...

Hey~ Cresson! It's time for training~ Today's training is
handstand walking for 100 rounds around the atrium~

Ah, yes! I am on it!
Please excuse me, guys, see you later!

He walks away so fast...
But then again... The training of the Guard is quite casual.

I think Tandrion did it on the spur of the moment.
Ha-ha, Cresson is really an upright moron.

Hehe, that means he's simple.
However... Even in my eyes, he's way too simple...
